mapper.select: SELECT S.MSGID ,SR.SCHEDULE_TYPE ,SR.SUBJECT ,SR.SMS_MSG ,SR.NOW_DATE ,SR.SEND_DATE ,S.SENDTYPE ,SR.DEST_COUNT ,SR.CALLBACK ,SR.SUCC_COUNT ,SR.FAIL_COUNT FROM UMS_MSG_SEND S, SDK_SMS_REPORT_2101 SR WHERE S.RESERVED1 = SR.RESERVED1
mapper.update: UPDATE UMS_MSG_SEND A SET ( A.SENDDATE ,A.SUCCCNT ,A.FAILCNT ) = ( SELECT B.SEND_DATE ,B.SUCC_COUNT ,B.FAIL_COUNT FROM SDK_SMS_REPORT_2101 B WHERE RESERVED1=#{id} ) WHERE A.MSGID=#{id}
